data.title: Arthur C. Clarke – Audio Books, Best Sellers, Author Bio
data.meta_description: Learn more about Arthur C. Clarke. Browse Arthur C. Clarke’s best-selling audiobooks and newest titles. Discover more authors you’ll love listening to on Audible.
data.text:
The Collected Stories of Arthur C. Clarke

By: Arthur C. Clarke

Narrated by: Ralph Lister, Ray Porter, Jonathan Davis

Length: 51 hrs and 4 mins

Unabridged

Overall

4.5 out of 5 stars 1,500

Performance

4.5 out of 5 stars 1,303

Story

4.5 out of 5 stars 1,298

From early work through classic stories and all the way to later work, this comprehensive short story collection encapsulates one of the great science fiction careers of all time....

5 out of 5 stars

The Case for Mars

The Plan to Settle the Red Planet and Why We Must

4.5 out of 5 stars 353

Since the beginning of human history Mars has been an alluring dream - the stuff of legends, gods, and mystery. The planet most like ours, it has still been thought impossible to reach, let alone explore and inhabit. Now with the advent of a revolutionary new plan, all this has changed....
